Uses of Class
org.ddolib.examples.gruler.GRState

Packages that use GRState
Package
Description
org.ddolib.examples.gruler
This package implements the acs, astar and ddo models for the Golomb Rule Problem (GRP).

    Returns the initial state of the problem, containing only the first mark at position 0.

    Merges several GRState objects into a single relaxed state.

    Method
    Description
    int
    GRRanking.compare(GRState s1, GRState s2)
    Compares two GRState instances based on their last placed mark.
    Iterator<Integer>
    GRProblem.domain(GRState state, int var)
    Returns the possible domain values for the next decision (i.e., possible positions for the next mark).
    double

    Computes the relaxed cost of transitioning between two states in the relaxed problem.
